name: RollbackEnvironmentsMigration
description:
Trigger rollback migration for multi-environment projects.

Use this tool to initiate an environments rollback migration for users who were previously on multi-environment projects in Datadog. This involves mapping source environment IDs to target environment IDs to perform the rollback.

parameters.name: organization_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the organization for the rollback operation.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this organization.

parameters.name: environments_mapping
parameters.description: A JSON object mapping source environment IDs to target environment IDs for rollback. Example: { "2": 2, "116911": 2 }.

default_experiment_stats_method.description:
Default statistical method for new experiments in this organization.

* `bayesian` - Bayesian
* `frequentist` - Frequentist

default_role_id.description: ID of the role to automatically assign to new members joining the organization

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this organization.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this organization.

default_experiment_stats_method.description:
Default statistical method for new experiments in this organization.

* `bayesian` - Bayesian

default_role_id.description: ID of the role to automatically assign to new members joining the organization
